ARABIC: فَأَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنِ ٱضْرِب بِّعَصَاكَ ٱلْبَحْرَ فَٱنفَلَقَ فَكَانَ كُلُّ فِرْقٍ كَٱلطَّوْدِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: So We revealed to Musa, 'Strike the sea with your staff.' And it split in two, each part like a towering cliff.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We commanded Moses: "Smite the sea with your staff." And it parted, and every parting was like a lofty mountain.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then We revealed to Moses, (commanding him): "Strike the sea with your rod." Thereupon the sea split up, and then each became like the mass of a huge mount.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Moses said, "Certainly not. My Lord is with me and He will certainly guide me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So We sent the divine revelation to Moosa that, “Strike the sea with your staff”; thereupon the sea parted; so each part was like a huge mountain.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then We revealed to Musa (saying): "Strike the sea with your stick." And it parted, and each separate part became like huge mountain.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then We revealed to Musa: Strike the sea with your staff. So it had cloven asunder, and each part was like a huge mound.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Then We revealed to Moses, 'Strike with thy staff the sea'; and it clave, and each part was as a mighty mount.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then We inspired Moses, saying: Smite the sea with thy staff. And it parted, and each part was as a mountain vast.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Then We bade Moses strike the sea with his staff. And it parted, and each part was like a huge mountain.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then We revealed unto Musa, saying: smite thou the sea with thy staff. So it became separated, and each part was like unto a cliff mighty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Thereupon We revealed to Moses: ‘Strike the sea with your staff!’ Whereupon it parted, and each part was as if it were a great mountain.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then We told Moses by inspiration: "Strike the sea with thy rod." So it divided, and each separate part became like the huge, firm mass of a mountain.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then We inspired Musa (Moses) (saying): "Strike the sea with your stick." And it parted, and each separate part (of that sea water) became like the huge, firm mass of a mountain.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Then We revealed to Moses: 'Strike the sea with your staff', so it divided and each part was as a mighty mount.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We inspired Moses: “Strike the sea with your staff.” Whereupon it parted, and each part was like a huge hill.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then We inspired to Moses, "Strike with your staff the sea," and it parted, and each portion was like a great towering mountain.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:63] God, exalted be He, says: Thereupon We revealed to Moses: ‘Strike the sea with your staff’, and he struck it, whereupon it parted, it split into twelve parts, and each part was as a mighty mountain, between each of these parts were paths which they followed, such that not even the saddles or the felts of the riders were touched by water.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then We inspired Moses, saying: Smite the sea with thy staff. And) when he hit it (it parted) into 12 roads, (and each part) and each road (was as a mountain vast) like a huge mountain.
